summary: A coherent and light color scheme optimized for web dev (Vim and GVim)
name: Clean
description:
This light color scheme tries to remain coherent in different programming languages.

It is specially optimized for HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, C, Python, Ruby and XML.

Note that the .Xdefaults/.Xresources configuration is included within the script.

For better results, paste this config in your .Xdefaults/.Xresources file (don't forget to remove the quotes ;-) )...

Enjoy!

http://img713.imageshack.us/i/cleanu.png/
install_details: Just put the file in your  .vim/colors...
